Name: Sarita
Description:
Sarita was shot three times by a man on a motorcycle at around 9 pm on Avenida das Fronteiras, in Igapó, in the northern part of Natal. She died at the scene.

At the time she was walking to the liquor store where she worked.

TvT partner organization Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans nominuto.com 08.11.2013

https://jucapontonet.blogspot.com/2013/11/travesti-foi-executado-com-tiros-na.html

Name: C. Lipscomb
Description:
The victim was a person of colour. The undignified way her burned body was dumped in a trash bin indicates transgender hostiliy.

Name: Rosa Syad Ribut
Description:
Rosa was a person of colour and  of Indonesian descent. A local LGBT NGO speculates that the motif could have been "trans misogyny".

TvT project: Edmonton Journal  11.12.2013

Description: TvT partner organization Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans silvanocomunicacao.blogspot.com.br  27.11.2013

Name: Tyra Nicole Rengifo del Águila
Description:
Tyra was a stylist who died as a result of a cosmetic filler injection. Reportedly the material used was airplane oil and completely unsuitable for this purpose.

> A trans woman identified as C. [Tyra Nicole] Rengifo del Águila (27), lost her life in her home located in Surquillo after a woman injected unsuitable silicone into her buttocks and breasts on the last Saturday.
> 
> Her uncle, Abner Padilla Saldaña, said that a woman named Martina from Iquitos, was the one who injected the substance. She indicated that she injected approximately three liters into each buttock.
> 
> The victim's roommate did not want to talk to the police, despite the fact that the relatives indicated that she knew the identity of the person responsible for the death of C. [Tyra], who worked as a stylist. She was taken to the police station as part of the investigation.  

Tyra's death was not recorded on the official TDoR 2014 list.

https://www.americatv.com.pe/noticias/actualidad/transexual-murio-en-su-vivienda-en-surquillo-tras-inyectarse-silicona-en-los-gluteos-n123121
